DOC.brief_title: Microarray Expression Profiling Identify Stereotypic mRNA Profiles Preterm Delivery Order Unravel Biological Mechanisms
DOC.detailed_description: The understanding biological mechanism underlie preterm birth limit , make prevention preterm birth difficult . The incidence preterm birth worldwide vary 6 % -11 % singleton pregnancy , 64-93 % preterm delivery occur spontaneous onset labor ( preterm labor ) ( 1 ) . The risk factor associate preterm birth include demographic variable ethnic group , past obstetric history , complication current pregnancy infection fetal congenital anomaly . The current study aim investigate basic mechanism preterm labor systematically catalog change expression level express gene whose sequence available . The goal accomplish use microarray technology follow subsequent confirmative complementary analysis .
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : Consecutive patient admit follow diagnosis four different ethnic group ( Hispanic , African American , Asian , Caucasian ) : 1 . Preterm labor intact membrane 1. acute inflammation ; 2. chronic villitis ; 3. vascular pathology ; 4. identifiable lesion . 2 . Preterm delivery without labor follow reason : 1. preeclampsia ; 2. abruptio placenta ; 3. fetal anomaly ; 4 . Other complication ( e.g . automobile accident ) necessitate immediate delivery . 3 . PROM lead preterm delivery 1. acute inflammation ; 2. chronic villitis ; 3. vascular pathology ; 4. identifiable lesion . 4 . Term delivery without labor identifiable lesion . 5 . Term delivery spontaneous labor identifiable lesion . 6 . Term delivery chorioamnionitis . 7 . Term delivery fail labor lead ceasarean section . EXCLUSION CRITERIA : 1 . Refusal write informed consent 2 . Fetal maternal condition mandate immediate delivery ( i.e . fetal distress , significant hemorrhage , etc . )
